description: Tracks which entity the component holder is currently kneeling before. Represents a positional state where the actor has assumed a kneeling position directed toward another entity.

entityId.description: The ID of the entity that the component holder is kneeling before

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'entityId' for standard entity references.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. High priority (75) because kneeling is a prominent positional state.
